com.namics.oss.spring.support.batch.service.impl

Class JobServiceImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.namics.oss.spring.support.batch.service.impl.JobServiceImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    JobService

    public class JobServiceImpl
extends Object
implements JobService
    Default implementation. used to start/stop jobs without knowing of the specific spring batch job repo/launcher classes. adds timestamp to each job as param to ensure uniqueness.
    Since:
    Jan 10, 2013
    Author:
    lboesch, Namics AG

        public void startNextInstance(String jobName)
        Description copied from interface: JobService
